title: Innerself Hacker News
description: 4KB hacker news clone using the tiny `innerself` js library.

title: Laughing All the Way to the Crash
description: A search for humor in 20 years of Fed meeting transcripts reveals that LOLing peaked right before the recession.

title: d3-exploder
description: D3.js plugin for mapping svg features within a map to x,y coordinates.

title: Mapping America's Futures
description: Interactive map showing demographic projections for the United States, reaching out to 2030.

title: Mapping gunshots near DC schools
description: Some DC schools have been in close range of as many as 16 gunfire incidents in the course of a school year, according to Urban Institute analysis.

title: Interactive Pension Policy Simulator
description: This javascript tool enables experimentation with pension policy parameters, showing changes to individual outcomes.
